Sigrit-Lemtov... magazine cover, shoot with you on sexy island,
translation.zh:
‎西格莉特-莱姆托夫 上杂志封面
‎去美丽的小岛上拍音乐视频

translation.en: It would be very good deal for you.

translation.zh: ‎谢谢你为我做的一切 亚历山大

translation.en: We are waiting on Sigrit! Sir.
translation.zh: ‎我们在等西格莉特 先生！

translation.en: -My king, your queen has arrived. -Thank you, Kevin Swain.
translation.zh:
‎-国王 您的王后来了
‎-谢谢你 凯文斯旺

translation.en: It is a costume I made.
Well, maybe if you were more focused and not out dancing all night,
translation.zh:
‎如果你更专心一点
‎昨晚没在外面跳一整夜的舞

translation.en: you might feel better about it.
You don't have to do this.
Okay, and are we ready now?
I have never been more ready!
Okay, do you think I'm stupid?
A guy like Lemtov, all he wants from a girl like you--
translation.zh:
‎像莱姆托夫那样的男人
‎他只想对你这样的姑娘…

translation.en: Oh, well, I didn't sleep with Mita.
Yeah, and I think I know rotten shark meat when I smell it!
translation.zh:
‎好吧 有奸情的时候
‎我一定能感觉出来！

translation.en: -Can't talk to you when you're like this. -Know what, Lars?
translation.zh:
‎-你这个样子我没办法跟你沟通
‎-这样吧 拉斯

translation.en: Why don't you just go ahead and sleep with everyone? Eh?
translation.zh: ‎你干脆去把所有人都睡了吧

translation.en: You know, hey, maybe I will, too.
translation.zh: ‎嘿 其实我或许也会这么做

translation.en: Because, you know, we're both free,
I am happy to go sex-nuts.
I am going to have sex with everyone!
Starting with that lady, emptying the garbage can.
translation.zh: ‎就从那个清空垃圾桶的女士开始

translation.en: Yes, holding the iPad or whatever that is--
translation.zh: ‎对 手拿iPad或什么玩意的家伙…

translation.en: I can't read what it says on your name tag.
I'm going to have sex with you, my friend.
translation.zh: ‎我要跟你上床 我的朋友

translation.en: I'm going to be all over you.
It's going to be passionate and white-hot.
You're going to melt under my body heat.
So listen up, everyone, there is a new...
sex machine in town, and his name is Lars.
translation.zh: ‎新的性爱机器大驾光临 他就叫拉斯

translation.en: Go tell that to your Russian friend.
Yeah, well, at least he sees me.
And I don't like this version of the song.
And I want to go back to the way it was.
You have to focus up. The semifinals are tomorrow.
translation.zh: ‎你得专心准备 明天就是半决赛了

translation.en: You are blowing it big time.

translation.zh: ‎你真幼稚 拉斯埃里克松

translation.en: And Iceland, your time is up. Please clear the stage.
translation.zh: ‎冰岛选手 你们的时间到了 请清场
‎你就是个奇丑无比的窝囊废

translation.en: Sigrit was right. You are small.
translation.zh: ‎西格莉特说得对 你好幼稚

translation.en: Why did you say you would have sex with all those people? That was ridiculous.
translation.zh: ‎你为何说要睡遍那些人？简直荒唐
‎拜托 你就是在让自己出丑

translation.en: Do you think you'd have a chance with Theo?

translation.zh:
‎-永远不会
‎-永远不会 想都别想了

translation.en: Hey, dude, uh, do you know if this is where they shot G.O.T.?
translation.zh:
‎嘿 伙计 你知道这里
‎是否是《权游》的拍摄地吗？

translation.en: Give me a break, man. Can't you see I was talking to my reflection?
translation.zh:
‎别烦我 没看到我正在
‎跟自己的倒影谈话吗？

translation.en: Why do you Americans always say "chill out" like that to everyone?
translation.zh:
‎你们美国佬干吗
‎总是对所有人说“冷静？”

translation.en: Jeff, let's go. The guy's nuts.
translation.zh: ‎杰夫 我们走 这人是疯子

translation.en: Hey, Europe is not your party town.
translation.zh: ‎嘿 欧洲不是你们的派对小镇

translation.en: All right? You come over here and you shit on everything.
translation.zh:
‎知道吗？你们来到这里
‎到处搞得乌烟瘴气

‎-不是吧
‎-你们存点敬畏之心吧

translation.en: Go home and build your wall.
-You shit-for-brains Americans. -Let's get out of here.
translation.zh:
‎-你们这些白痴美国佬
‎-我们快走吧

translation.en: -They have a special for Americans. -Where's the Starbucks?
translation.zh:
‎-他们为美国佬准备了特饮
‎-星巴克在哪？

translation.en: That Starbucks, it's anywhere you look, okay?
translation.zh: ‎你说的可是星巴克 到处都是 好吗？

translation.en: -Oh. -Just smell for the Pumpkin Spice Latte.
translation.zh:
‎-噢
‎-去好好闻南瓜派调味粉拿铁

translation.en: -[Jeff] Was he trying to help? -[man] I think so.
♪ With this great big world before me ♪
♪ But its all for someone else ♪
♪ To let you know just where my heart is ♪
♪ To tell the truth and not pretend ♪
♪ Thought I made it clear Do I have to say it? ♪
translation.zh:
‎我以为你已经明白我的心意
‎我必须说出口吗？

translation.en: ♪ It was always there, you just-- ♪
-You must leave Eurovision. -No! I'm not listening to you.
translation.zh:
‎-你必须放弃欧洲歌唱大赛
‎-不行！我不要听你的

translation.en: We have to think about the band.
[Mita] Okay, but look. Life is long.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 但你听着 人这辈子很长

translation.en: And you and Lars have kind of spent most of it together.
translation.zh: ‎你和拉斯一起走过了那么多岁月

translation.en: But if I had someone like that in my life, I don't think I would let a night of...
translation.zh:
‎如果我生命中有这样一个人
‎我绝不会让一个…
‎什么都没发生的晚上毁掉我们

translation.en: I'm equally surprised because, you know, I'm very sexy.
translation.zh:
‎我也挺惊讶的
‎因为 你也知道 我很性感

translation.en: I mean, I tried, but he didn't want to.
translation.zh: ‎我尽了全力 但他就是不想做

translation.en: [Graham Norton] Welcome to the Eurovision Song Contest 2020.
We're about to get underway, so let's go over to this year's hosts,
translation.zh:
‎比赛马上开始
‎我们把麦克风交给今年的主持人

translation.en: who are Corin Vladvitch and Sasha More.
translation.zh: ‎科林维拉德维奇和萨莎摩尔

translation.en: Hello, Eurovision! Can you believe it?
translation.zh: ‎你好 欧洲歌唱大赛！你能相信吗？

translation.en: Welcome to tonight's very magical, big show!

translation.zh: ‎对 我们可是有备而来 科林！

translation.en: It is the night we have all been waiting for...
Yeah, I was angry, too. And...
translation.zh: ‎嗯 我也很生气 而且…

translation.en: You know what the elves say?
I don't know what the elves say. I don't believe in elves, but...
translation.zh:
‎我不知道精灵怎么说的
‎我不相信精灵 但是…

translation.en: -"Anger cannot churn the butter." -Churn the butter.
And I think it's really true.
I had them to go back to the way the song originally was
before Jae-bong added the "fresh, coz" flow and all the "bish".
translation.zh:
‎在杰宝加入“清新、老兄
‎老妹”的节奏和“小妞儿、小哥”之前

translation.en: -Thank you, Lars. That means a lot to me. -No, it's what's right.
translation.zh:
‎-谢谢你 拉斯 这对我来说意义重大
‎-不 这么做是应该的
‎嘿 约翰尼 你看起来很帅嘛

translation.en: Why don't you leave them be? We'll find you someone else to play with.
translation.zh:
‎你还是别管他们了
‎我们会另外帮你找个玩伴

translation.en: Oh, she is so special, Mita.
With her by my side, I could be bigger than ever.
translation.zh: ‎有她在 我能攀登上最高峰

translation.en: But she will never be happy.
translation.zh: ‎但那样的话 她永远不会开心

translation.en: I will give her everything he cannot.
translation.zh: ‎他给不了她的 我都会给她

translation.en: -Are you performing tonight? -No, but I come to support you.
translation.zh:
‎-你今晚会上台吗？
‎-不会 但我是来支持你的

translation.en: It's very kind of you to come support us, singing together,
translation.zh:
‎你能来支持我们一起唱歌
‎真是太好心了

translation.en: as a duo, that will never be separated.
translation.zh: ‎作为搭档 我们永远不会分开

translation.en: George Michael said same thing about... other Wham! guy.
translation.zh:
‎乔治迈克尔当年也是这么说
‎另一个…威猛乐队成员的

translation.en: No one even know his name.
So guys, I am feeling quite nervous, actually.
translation.zh: ‎两位 其实我还挺紧张的

translation.en: What? Why? You don't have even single chance of making it.
translation.zh:
‎什么？为什么？
‎你们根本就没有进决赛的可能性

translation.en: Odds-makers say you wont get single vote.
translation.zh: ‎赔率工作人员说你们一票都得不到

translation.en: Just... remember what we talk about the other night, okay?
translation.zh: ‎别忘了我们那晚聊过的事 好吗？

translation.en: What did you talk about with him the other night?
Not that I care. Just curious.
translation.zh: ‎不是因为我在乎 我只是好奇

translation.en: And Belarus came out of the gates kicking.
translation.zh: ‎贝拉卢斯率先上场 来势汹汹

translation.en: A very fast start to this year's competition.
translation.zh: ‎火爆拉开了今年比赛的序幕

translation.en: Oh, call the police. Our girl is killing it!
translation.zh: ‎快报警啊 我们的妞儿燃爆了！

translation.en: Dalibor Jinsky, from San Marino, crying for no apparent reason.
translation.zh:
‎戴利博尔金斯基 来自圣马力诺
‎嚎啕大哭 让人摸不着头脑

translation.en: ♪ We're stuck in this world of madness ♪
translation.zh: ‎我们被困在这个疯狂的世界里

translation.en: ♪ Too much of this fear and sadness ♪
♪ We're running in a treadmill, baby ♪
translation.zh: ‎我们在跑步机上跑啊跑 宝贝

translation.en: ♪ Get out of it Don't try to fit ♪
♪ Come into our world of freedom ♪

translation.zh: ‎你可以在这里为所欲为 来吧

translation.en: ♪ Open up the door You'll see ♪
♪ Seize the moment Leave your worries far behind ♪
translation.zh: ‎享受当下 把烦恼远远抛在身后

translation.en: ♪ Let us dream away Seize the moment-- ♪
And now, Sweden's own, Johnny John John.
translation.zh: ‎现在是瑞典选手约翰尼约翰

translation.en: -Lars, did you change my costume? -Yes, I did.
translation.zh:
‎-拉斯 你改了我的演出服吗？
‎-嗯 是的

translation.en: -The scarf is so long. -I know, isn't it great? It's extra long.
translation.zh:
‎-这条围巾太长了
‎-我知道 是不是很棒？超级长的

translation.en: Don't worry. It's for the dimensions of the stage.
translation.zh: ‎被担心 是为了舞台效果考虑

translation.en: Come on. These guys are awful.
Turn on the song contest. I want to watch Iceland.
translation.zh: ‎换到歌唱大赛 我想看冰岛选手表演

translation.en: Lars and Sigrit are from our town.
translation.zh: ‎拉斯和西格莉特跟我们是同乡

translation.en: They've grown up with all of us.
Lenderman, did you not teach them both as children?
translation.zh:
‎兰德曼 他俩小时候
‎不是你的学生吗？

translation.en: Steve Gundersson, they played music at your first wedding.
translation.zh:
‎史蒂夫甘德森
‎你第一次结婚时是他们在婚礼上演奏

translation.en: Oh, shut up. No one wants to watch them.
translation.zh: ‎闭嘴吧 没人想看他们表演

translation.en: Half the children in this town are probably his.
translation.zh: ‎镇上一半的孩子可能都是他的

translation.en: But the only one who truly loves him, he won't even acknowledge.
translation.zh:
‎但唯一真正爱他的那个
‎他甚至都不肯承认他

translation.en: We know they're awful, but they're our awful.
translation.zh:
‎我们知道他们很烂
‎但自家人肯定要捧场！

translation.en: I say change the channel and let's take our medicine!
[Graham] Ah. Now the moment we've all been waiting for. Iceland.
translation.zh: ‎我们期盼已久的时刻来了 冰岛选手

translation.en: Every performance is an adventure with this group.
translation.zh: ‎这个组合的每次表演都是冒险

translation.en: And why they're here is anyone's guess.
translation.zh: ‎至于他们为何能入围 众说纷纭

translation.en: ♪ All of my nights turned morning ♪
♪ And I suddenly found my glory ♪
♪ I wanna stop the clocks And hold you close ♪
translation.zh: ‎我希望时钟停止摆动 紧紧抱住你

translation.en: ♪ Hey, baby, when you look at me ♪
translation.zh: ‎嘿 宝贝 当你看着我时

translation.en: ♪ I know I’m in double trouble tonight ♪
translation.zh: ‎我知道自己今晚会有双份麻烦

translation.en: Okay, so not as bad as we expected.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 也没我们预想的那么糟糕

translation.en: ♪ I know I’m in double trouble tonight ♪
translation.zh: ‎我知道自己今晚会有双份麻烦

translation.en: ♪ How can something so wrong Feel so right? ♪
translation.zh:
‎这么严重的错误
‎为何让人觉得理所当然？

translation.en: ♪ Nothing makes me feel like you do ♪
♪ Up is down, down is up ♪
-[laughing] -♪ I just wanna break every rule ♪
♪ I wanna stop the clocks And hold you close ♪
translation.zh: ‎我希望时钟停止摆动 紧紧抱住你

translation.en: -♪ Hold you close ♪ -♪ But I don't know how ♪
translation.zh:
‎-紧紧抱住你
‎-但我不知道该如何做到

translation.en: Ooh and now the hamster wheel is off to the races.
translation.zh: ‎现在那个仓鼠轮开始全速前进

translation.en: We're hearing voices, so they're not dead.
translation.zh: ‎我们听到了说话声 所以他们没死

translation.en: Someone is coming through the wheel.
Iceland managed to set a new low bar for Eurovision failure.
translation.zh:
‎冰岛为欧洲歌唱大赛上的失误
‎设立了新低

translation.en: And this audience of hysterical fans
have responded in a typically irrational way.
translation.zh: ‎居然以一种出人意料的方式回应

‎-等一下 我们这是去哪？
‎-回家

translation.en: -What? -No, no, we have to go back in there.
Because all of Iceland is watching.
-[sighs] But... -Our family, our friends, my students.
translation.zh:
‎-可是…
‎-我们的家人、朋友、我的学生

translation.en: What do you mean? We already did.
translation.zh:
‎你什么意思？
‎我们已经让他们失望了！

translation.en: I'm not going back in there where everyone is going to keep laughing at me.
translation.zh: ‎我不会回那里的 所有人都会嘲笑我

translation.en: I am going to go into that artists' area because I am an artist.
translation.zh: ‎我要回到歌手区 因为我是个歌手

translation.en: And when I see that no votes come in for us,
I'm going to sit there and I'm going to take it
because I know I am more than this contest.
translation.zh:
‎因为我知道自己的价值不仅仅
‎体现在这场比赛里

translation.en: Lars, I have never asked you for anything, ever.
translation.zh: ‎拉斯 我从未要求你做过任何事

translation.en: But I am asking you to do this for me.
And I am asking you to go.
Please, you're being very selfish right now.
You know that all I've ever wanted is to win.
Lemtov was right. You just will never be satisfied.
translation.zh: ‎莱姆托夫说得对 你永远不会满足

translation.en: Lemtov? What-- What does Lemtov know?
translation.zh: ‎莱姆托夫？莱姆托夫知道什么？

‎-比如说？
‎-比如说 他知道精灵

translation.en: But he doesn't know about us, does he?
You don't mean that. He's just putting silly ideas into your head, okay?
translation.zh:
‎那不是你的真心话
‎他就是在给你洗脑 好吗？

translation.en: Fine, walk away. Go to Lemtov.
translation.zh: ‎好啊 你走吧！去找莱姆托夫吧！

translation.en: And go sing your love song to him, all right?
translation.zh: ‎去把你的情歌唱给他听 好吗？

translation.en: Yeah, I know all about your song.
I heard you writing it back at the hotel.
translation.zh: ‎那天在酒店我听到你写歌了

translation.en: I wrote that song for you.
And now, it's time for you to go to your phones
and text in your votes to the numbers you see on your television screens.
translation.zh: ‎发短信投票给电视屏幕上的选手号码

translation.en: [Corin] And remember, you cannot vote for your own country.
translation.zh: ‎记住 不能给自己的国家投票

translation.en: -Thank you. -What a wonderful show we have tonight.
translation.zh:
‎-谢谢
‎-今晚的演出真是太精彩了

translation.en: [woman on TV] Norway gives eight points to our neighbor Sweden.
translation.zh: ‎挪威要把8分投给我们的邻居瑞典

translation.en: Coming to you live from Reykjavik, Iceland.
translation.zh: ‎我在冰岛雷克雅未克进行现场投票

translation.en: They were awful. Next year, it will be better. I promise.
translation.zh:
‎我们的选手太烂了
‎明年情况会好很多 我保证

translation.en: We'll send someone else. Just anyone.
translation.zh: ‎我们会派别的人去 随便谁都行

translation.en: But here are the votes from the Icelandic jury.
translation.zh: ‎但这是来自冰岛评审团的投票

translation.en: [Neils on TV] And finally, 12 points go to the Netherlands.
translation.zh: ‎最后 我们的12分投给荷兰
‎…来自瑞士对欧洲歌唱大赛的投票

translation.en: Did we just hear "points for Iceland"?
[woman on TV] Ten points go to Sweden, and 12 points to Greece.
[man on TV] Good evening, Europe. Hello, from Czech Republic.
translation.zh:
‎晚上好 欧洲
‎大家好 我来自捷克共和国

translation.en: The moment you're all waiting for.
And our ten points go to...
The Eastern Bloc countries are giving votes to Iceland.
translation.zh: ‎东欧集团国家纷纷投票给冰岛

‎-等一下 他们在说冰岛吗？
‎-冰岛

translation.en: Romania gives eight points to Iceland.
France gives eight points to Iceland!
It will be up to the popular vote, but they are doing much better
translation.zh:
‎最后结果取决于大众投票
‎但他们的成绩比赔率工作人员

translation.en: Okay, now Sasha, let's see how the popular vote went
translation.zh: ‎好了 萨莎 我们看看大众投票的情况

translation.en: and find out who has made it through to the finale.
The first country through to the final night is...
translation.zh: ‎第一个进入总决赛之夜的国家是…

translation.en: The second country that will be going to the final is...
translation.zh: ‎第二个进入总决赛的国家是…
‎对 干得漂亮 克罗地亚！

translation.en: Corin, there are only two more countries that are going to make it into the final.
translation.zh: ‎科林 现在总决赛仅剩下两个席位

translation.en: It's okay, you still have chance.
But you have a lot of points.
And the last country that will make it
for the grand finale on Saturday night will be...
translation.zh: ‎周六晚上盛大总决赛的国家是…

translation.en: The numbers are in... Iceland is in?
translation.zh: ‎统计数字…冰岛进入总决赛了？

translation.en: I'm taking this rope that's loose and I'm rolling it around
to make it like in a circle.
I'm going to become a fisherman.
And drink myself to death like a real Erickssong man.
translation.zh: ‎然后像埃里克松家的人一样喝死

translation.en: Rich, hairless Russian guy with a huge dingle-dong came between us.
translation.zh:
‎那个没毛、有着大屌的
‎俄罗斯富豪横亘在我们中间
‎人生在世 难免有不如意

translation.en: Remember, give up on your dreams now while you're still young.
translation.zh: ‎记住了 趁着年轻赶紧放弃梦想！

translation.en: How can you be a fisherman if you're scared of the fish?
translation.zh: ‎你要是怕鱼 怎么当渔夫？

translation.en: -What, are you joking at me? -Joking at you?
translation.zh:
‎-你在开我的玩笑嘛？
‎-开你的玩笑？

translation.en: -No, I'm tired of it. -Tired of what?
translation.zh:
‎-不 我受够了
‎-受够什么了？

translation.en: I'm tired of you constantly making fun of everything that I do.
translation.zh:
‎我受够了不管我做什么
‎你都会嘲弄我

translation.en: I've spent my whole life trying to earn your respect.
translation.zh: ‎我一辈子都在努力赢得你的尊重

translation.en: And you know what? I don't need it anymore.
translation.zh: ‎但你知道吗？我现在不需要了

translation.en: And if you're never going to respect me,
then, so be it. I don't need it, okay?
translation.zh: ‎那无所谓了 反正我不需要 好吗？

translation.en: -Lars. Lars, come here. -How do you get off this boat?
-Where is the exit? -[Erick] There is no exit.
-It's a boat, Lars. -How do you get off this thing?
translation.zh:
‎-这是条船 拉斯
‎-要怎么下船？

translation.en: Now what do you see over there? Hmm?
translation.zh: ‎你往那边看 能看到什么？

translation.en: And you have done something for Iceland.
Something none of us could ever do.
translation.zh: ‎我们这些人永远都做不到的贡献

translation.en: It has brought us all great pride.
translation.zh: ‎给我们带来了巨大的自豪感

translation.en: -No, it was a disaster. -Yes, but you did not quit.
translation.zh:
‎-不 那就是场灾难
‎-对 但你没有放弃

translation.en: You have Viking spirit in you.
until you got back up on that stage
after that stupid hamster wheel went into the audience.
translation.zh: ‎在哪个破仓鼠轮失控跑到观众席之后

translation.en: You have always reminded me of your mother.
She passed too soon for the both of us.
She would have been proud of you, Lars.
translation.zh: ‎她一定会为你感到自豪 拉斯

translation.en: I left Sigrit all alone. And now, she doesn't want me anymore.
translation.zh:
‎我把西格莉特一个人丢在了那里
‎现在她也不想要我了

translation.en: We've had bad luck with the Ericksdóttir women.
translation.zh:
‎我们跟埃里克斯多蒂尔家的女人
‎一向合不来
‎西格莉特的母亲 赫尔卡…

translation.en: Never wanted anything to do with me.
-How did I let this happen? -Oh, it doesn't matter what happened.
translation.zh:
‎-我怎么会让这种事发生？
‎-过去的事不重要了

translation.en: What happens now is that you have to fight for her.
You have to fight for her like you fought for that stupid song contest.
translation.zh:
‎你得去努力争取她
‎就像你为那个破歌唱大赛努力一样

translation.en: Fight for your dream of a life with her.
translation.zh: ‎跟她一起为实现梦想而努力！

translation.en: Sorry to disturb, but you two do know that Iceland made it into the Eurovison finals?
translation.zh:
‎抱歉打扰 但你们俩知道
‎冰岛进入欧洲歌唱大赛决赛了吧？

translation.en: Why the hell didn't you tell me?
-Well, we have to turn the boat around. -No, we can't lose a day of fishing.
translation.zh:
‎-那我们得赶紧掉头
‎-不行 这样会损失一天的捕鱼量

translation.en: -[Erick] Go get her, Lars! -[man] Go get her!
Why don't you stay with me after the contest?
translation.zh: ‎比赛过后 不如你跟我在一起吧？

translation.en: Alexander, we barely know each other.
translation.zh: ‎亚历山大 我们都不怎么了解对方

translation.en: Yes, but you are beautiful and kind.
I handsome and rich. This is typically very winning combination.
translation.zh:
‎我又帅又多金
‎我们在一起绝对是最佳组合

translation.en: When we sing, I feel connection that is unique for me.
translation.zh:
‎我们一起唱歌时
‎我能感受到我们之间与众不同的默契

translation.en: And if it helps, I can...
I don't really care about that stuff.
Victor. What are you doing here?
Can you give me a ride to the airport? We're in the finals of Eurovision.
translation.zh:
‎你能开车送我去机场吗？
‎我们进欧洲歌唱大赛总决赛了

translation.en: Yes, I know this. Big news.
translation.zh: ‎嗯 我知道 这可是大消息

translation.en: I was swimming in the water.
-[Victor] Yes. -[Lars] Can you take me somewhere first?
translation.zh:
‎-嗯
‎-但你能先送我去一个地方吗？

translation.en: -There's something I need to take care of. -[Victor] Yeah.
And I just wanted to come up here to ask of you guys
for any help you can give me.
I don't know how I'm going to fix things with Sigrit, but I have to try.
translation.zh:
‎我不知道该如何跟西格莉特和好
‎但我得去试试

translation.en: Have a good lunch, or whatever you're doing in there.
translation.zh:
‎祝你们午餐愉快
‎或者不管你们在做什么

translation.en: Never understood why half this country still believes in elves.
translation.zh:
‎我一直都不明白为何半个国家的人
‎还在信精灵

translation.en: I know, but Sigrit swears by them.
translation.zh: ‎我知道 但西格莉特超信的

translation.en: Iceland continues to have one foot in the Dark Ages, huh?
translation.zh:
‎冰岛还是有一只脚
‎在黑暗时代 对吧？

translation.en: What are we going to do?
Don't you understand? If you go back to that stupid girl,
translation.zh: ‎你不明白吗？如果你去找那个傻姑娘

translation.en: you could win that contest, and we cannot have that!
translation.zh: ‎就有可能夺冠！我们可承担不起！

translation.en: And they will point the finger at me!
[choking] You really think we could win?
I blew up that boat! I killed all those people!
translation.zh:
‎是我炸掉的那艘船！
‎是我杀了那些人！

translation.en: I'll just leave the knife here,
in case you have to do other murders!
[Colin] Welcome to tonight's grand finale of the Eurovision Song Contest.
translation.zh: ‎欢迎收看今晚的欧洲歌唱大赛总决赛

translation.en: [Sasha] It is the biggest night of the year.
And the one we have all been waiting for.
I-- I don't know. Do you?
I left him a couple of messages, but he never responded.
translation.zh: ‎我给他留了好几条留言 他都没回

translation.en: He's gonna be so bummed out if he misses this.
translation.zh: ‎他要是错过比赛 一定会很沮丧的

translation.en: Yes, if he's not here, he's gonna miss it.
translation.zh: ‎对 如果他不在 一定会错过

translation.en: Let the grand finale of the Eurovision Song Contest begin!
translation.zh: ‎欧洲歌唱大赛总决赛现在开始！

translation.en: -Where the hell is everyone? -At home, watching Eurovision.
translation.zh:
‎-人都哪去了？
‎-在家看欧洲歌唱大赛啊

translation.en: -That the guy from the fountain? -Oh, my God. What is he wearing?
translation.zh:
‎-老天！他穿的是什么？
‎-喷泉旁那个家伙？
‎嘿！美国佬 我最好的朋友

translation.en: New York Jets, right? Take my horse down to Old Town Road?
translation.zh:
‎纽约喷气机队 对吧？
‎《骑马走在乡村古道》？

translation.en: Yes, I need a ride, okay?
translation.zh: ‎对 我得搭个车 好吗？

translation.en: No, Paris is a dump. You don't want to go there.
translation.zh:
‎别 巴黎就是个垃圾堆
‎还是别去那里了

translation.en: You need to take me to Eurovision Song Contest.
translation.zh: ‎你们得送我去欧洲歌唱大赛的现场

translation.en: Jamba Juice! Come on, let's go.
Dude, this is a rental. I gotta take this back.
translation.zh: ‎伙计 这车是租来的 我得还回去

translation.en: -He's getting in the car? -Oh, my God.
Yeah, that's great. Close the door, close it.
translation.zh: ‎对 好极了 快关车门

‎-拜托 快走吧 兄弟
‎-老天！

translation.en: I need to get to Sigrit. She goes on in ten minutes.
translation.zh:
‎我得去找西格莉特
‎她还有10分钟就要上场了！

translation.en: And now the Russian performer, Alexander Lemtov.
translation.zh:
‎现在上场的是俄罗斯的表演者
‎亚历山大莱姆托夫

translation.en: The favorite still, with his song "Lion of Love."
translation.zh:
‎他依然是我的最爱
‎他为大家带来《狮子之爱》

translation.en: Put the pedal to the metal. Let's go!
There is no speed limit in all of Europe.
translation.zh: ‎整个欧洲就没有限速这一说

translation.en: They may be small, but you've got them.
translation.zh: ‎你的“胆”或许很小 但你肯定有

translation.en: ♪ I was happy laying 'round in the shadows Unbothered by flies ♪
translation.zh: ‎我开心地躺在阴影里 不为苍蝇烦恼

translation.en: ♪ Surrounded by so many That just didn’t light my fire ♪
translation.zh:
‎身边有莺莺燕燕
‎但她们都点燃不了我内心的火焰

translation.en: ♪ Bu-hu-hut then I turned 'round and I saw a gazelle with a flirtatious smile ♪
translation.zh:
‎但当我转身
‎看到一只带着媚笑的小羚羊

translation.en: ♪ Swift as the wind she was gone But you won't get away this time ♪
translation.zh:
‎她像风一般疾驰而去
‎但你这次不会逃掉

translation.en: Can you let me out the car, please? This is scary. Just stop the car.
translation.zh:
‎能让我下车吗？这也太吓人了
‎快停车

translation.en: You need to relax 'cause otherwise you're going to get thrown out on the next turn.
translation.zh:
‎你冷静点 不然到了下个转弯处
‎你就会被丢出车外

translation.en: ♪ I’ll be the king you wanted ♪
♪ You’ll be the queen I need ♪
♪ And on and on and on and on ♪
[woman] So, is Eurovision like The Voice?
translation.zh: ‎欧洲歌唱大赛就像《好声音》吗？

translation.en: [Lars] Would you shut up? No! It's not like The Voice.
translation.zh:
‎你能闭嘴吗？不是的！
‎它跟《好声音》不一样

translation.en: Yes! Of course it is, you shithead!
It says Eurovision right on it. Don't slow down!
translation.zh:
‎上面写着欧洲歌唱大赛呢
‎别减速啊！

translation.en: ♪ I will make you rise up ♪
♪ You’ll know, you'll know I’m done ♪
♪ Will meet the lion of love ♪
♪ Will meet the lion of love ♪
♪ Will meet the lion of love ♪
-Yes! We made it! Eurovision. -Oh, my God.
translation.zh:
‎-真棒！我们成功了！欧洲歌唱大赛
‎-我的天

translation.en: All right. Hey! Thank you, Americans! You're awful people! Ha-ha!
translation.zh:
‎好了 嘿！谢谢你们 美国佬！
‎你们真是糟透了！

translation.en: No, but seriously! Don't come to Iceland!
translation.zh: ‎不 但说真的！千万别去冰岛！

translation.en: We don't want you! You might be killed by elves!
translation.zh:
‎我们不喜欢你们！
‎你们可能会被精灵杀死！

translation.en: Oh! Tonight we conquer stage, tomorrow the world.
translation.zh:
‎今晚我们征服舞台
‎明天我们就去征服世界！

translation.en: Um... uh... Lemtov, I need to ask you something.
translation.zh: ‎莱姆托夫 我得问你一件事

translation.en: No! No, no! Of course not. I am Russian.
translation.zh: ‎不是！当然不是 我可是俄罗斯人

translation.en: Statistically speaking, I think that's impossible.
translation.zh: ‎但从数据上来说 我认为有这个可能

‎-我向你保证 我百分百不是
‎-性别酷儿呢？

translation.en: Fact of truth. No gay Russian.
translation.zh: ‎这是事实 俄罗斯没有基佬

‎-也不是非二元性别？
‎-不 不是的 我是百分百直男

translation.en: so a lot has happened since I came here, and--
translation.zh: ‎我来这里后发生了很多事 然后…

translation.en: Shh. We talk about this later time.
You go, sing your heart out.
I am here, Corin, the green room, where only the artists can sit...
translation.zh:
‎科林 我在休息室
‎歌手们都坐在这里…

‎-拉斯…
‎-不行 拜托 我要迟到了

translation.en: Lars, please. You must listen to me.
translation.zh: ‎拉斯 拜托 你必须听我说

translation.en: Victor Karlosson killed me. He blew me up on the boat
translation.zh:
‎维克多卡洛森害死了我
‎他炸毁了我所在的船

translation.en: and now he's going to try to kill you.
Have you not been using your ghost powers to watch anything that's happening?
translation.zh:
‎你就没用自己的妖力
‎看看都发生了什么吗？

‎-什么？
‎-对 他已经试过杀我了

translation.en: Yeah. So, like, come on. Seriously. Thank you so much. Is that it?
translation.zh:
‎嗯 拜托！说真的 非常感谢你
‎你还有别的话要说吗？

translation.en: She's not a very helpful ghost.
[Graham] It appears only one half of Fire Saga will be performing tonight.
translation.zh: ‎看来火焰传说今晚只有一人演唱

translation.en: Why are you laughing? I'm trying to have a fist fight with you!
You hit me but it's very light.
translation.zh: ‎你的拳头打到我身上就像棉花一样

translation.en: You are the one who should stay away.
Comfort, security, mansion, palace, Wi-Fi every room.
translation.zh:
‎舒适的生活、安全感、豪宅
‎皇宫、每个房间都有无线网
‎你能给她什么？你什么都给不了

translation.en: Stop. Stop, stop the music, please! Stop. Stop.
translation.zh: ‎停下 音乐停止！拜托了！停下

translation.en: Here we go. Another adventure with the Icelanders.
translation.zh: ‎又来了 跟冰岛人再次一起冒险

translation.en: My name is Lars Erickssong from Iceland.
translation.zh: ‎我叫拉斯埃里克松 我来自冰岛

translation.en: And I’m sorry to be messing up the show.
I shouldn’t. I... I love this show.
translation.zh: ‎我不该这么做的 我超喜欢这个节目

translation.en: The Eurovision Song Contest means everything to me.
translation.zh: ‎欧洲歌唱大赛对我来说意味着一切

translation.en: Ever since I was a small child,
I always dreamed of winning the contest.
translation.zh: ‎我就一直梦想在大赛上夺冠

translation.en: as most of you know, Eurovision is much more than a competition.
translation.zh:
‎大多数人也知道
‎欧洲歌唱大赛不仅仅是一场比赛

translation.en: The music is not a contest.
And the perfect song isn't the winning song,
translation.zh: ‎最完美的歌曲不是能夺冠的歌曲

translation.en: but a song that comes from the heart.
♪ With this great big world before me ♪
♪ But it's all for someone else ♪
♪ To let you know just where my heart is ♪
♪ To tell the truth and not pretend ♪
♪ Just to realize That I was meant to stay ♪
♪ Where the mountains sing Through the screams of seagulls ♪
translation.zh:
‎留在山峦通过海鸥的尖叫声
‎发出阵阵歌声的地方

translation.en: ♪ Where the whales can live 'Cause they’re gentle people ♪
translation.zh:
‎在鲸鱼可以自在生活的地方
‎因为那里有温柔的人

translation.en: ♪ Thought I made it clear Do I have to say it? ♪
translation.zh:
‎我以为你已经明白我的心意
‎我必须说出口吗？

translation.en: ♪ It was always there We just didn’t see it ♪
translation.zh: ‎爱意一直都在 我们只是没看到

translation.en: ♪ All I need is you and me And my home... ♪
translation.zh:
‎我只需要你和我在一起
‎还有我的家乡…

translation.en: ♪ All the neon lights and billboards ♪
♪ To be seen and to be heard ♪
♪ But now I know what makes me happy ♪
translation.zh: ‎但现在我明白了什么能让我开心

translation.en: ♪ And I can tell you feel it too ♪
translation.zh: ‎我能看出来 你也感受到了

translation.en: ♪ Where the mountains sing Through the screams of seagulls ♪
translation.zh:
‎留在山峦通过海鸥的尖叫声
‎发出阵阵歌声的地方

translation.en: ♪ Where the whales can live 'Cause they’re gentle people ♪
translation.zh:
‎在鲸鱼可以自在生活的地方
‎因为那里有温柔的人

translation.en: ♪ Where the northern lights Burst out their colors ♪
♪ And the magic nights Surpass all others and... ♪
They will, of course, be disqualified for changing their song,
translation.zh: ‎但他们肯定也会因为改歌被取消资格
‎你这么做是对的 亚历山大

translation.en: I still win, of course, but...
How could I not be? Hmm?
You deserve to be happy, too.

translation.zh: ‎俄罗斯母亲可不赞同你的说法

translation.en: Maybe we get a yacht. I look fantastic with tan.
translation.zh:
‎或许我们会买一艘游艇
‎我美黑后肯定会很帅

translation.en: Wouldn't know, I haven't seen you with a real one.
translation.zh: ‎我怎么知道 我又没见过美黑的你

translation.en: -[Lars] ♪ Happy, happy, happy ♪ -[Sigrit] ♪ Bring me down ♪
We have a wonderful celebration tonight.
Big congratulations to Erick and Helka!
translation.zh: ‎让我们热烈恭喜埃里克和赫尔卡！

translation.en: -That's never not going to be weird. -No. Super not.
translation.zh:
‎-这种事以后再也不会让人觉得奇怪
‎-对 超级不奇怪

translation.en: Okay. You don't have to do the thumbs up, Dad.
translation.zh: ‎好了 你们不必举大拇指 爸爸

translation.en: Hey, Americans! Are you having a good time in Iceland?
translation.zh:
‎嘿 美国佬！
‎你们在冰岛玩得开心吗？

translation.en: -Well, we hate that you're here. -[man] Yeah!
Yeah! So why don't you go back home, all right?
translation.zh: ‎对！你们还是赶紧回老家吧 好吗？

translation.en: Don't you have some traffic to sit in
translation.zh: ‎你们不是经常开着怪物一样的卡车

translation.en: with your monster trucks and your chili corn dogs?
translation.zh:
‎一边堵在路上
‎一边吃辣味玉米热狗吗？

translation.en: Why, I have some opiates for you, you can take,
translation.zh: ‎我给你们准备了鸦片 你们可以带走

translation.en: while you over leverage your credit cards -and you buy too many houses. -Okay. Wow.
translation.zh:
‎当你们透支信用卡
‎买了太多房子的时候

translation.en: No, I'm not done! I hate you! I hate your guts!
translation.zh:
‎不行 我还没说完呢！我讨厌你们！
‎讨厌到家了！

translation.en: Who wants to hear a Eurovision song?
translation.zh: ‎谁想听欧洲歌唱大赛上的歌曲？

translation.en: One, two, a one, two, three, four.
♪ When I feel your gentle touch ♪
♪ And things are going our way ♪
translation.zh: ‎天时地利人和 一切都为我们

translation.en: ♪ I wanna spill my love on you ♪
translation.zh: ‎我想每时每刻都把爱倾注到你身上

translation.en: -♪ Ja ja ding dong ♪ -♪ Ding dong! ♪
♪ My love for you Is growing wide and long ♪
-♪ Ja ja ding dong ♪ -♪ Ding dong! ♪
♪ I swell and burst When I see what we've become ♪
translation.zh: ‎在明白我们的状况后 我膨胀又爆裂

translation.en: -♪ Ja ja ding dong ♪ -♪ Ding dong! ♪
♪ Come, come, my baby We can get love on ♪
translation.zh: ‎来嘛 宝贝 我们好好爱下去

translation.en: -♪ Ja ja ding dong ♪ -♪ Ding dong! ♪
♪ When I see you I feel a ding ding dong ♪
translation.zh: ‎我看到你时 感觉内心叮咚叮咚作响

translation.en: ♪ Love expands when I'm with you ♪
♪ I wanna open up to you ♪
All right, everyone, move your body. Whoo!
-♪ Ja ja ding dong ♪ -♪ Ding dong! ♪
♪ My love for you Is growing wide and long ♪
-♪ Ja ja ding dong ♪ -♪ Ding dong! ♪
♪ I swell and burst when I see What we've become ♪
translation.zh: ‎在明白我们的状况后 我膨胀又爆裂

translation.en: -♪ Ja ja ding dong ♪ -♪ Ding dong! ♪
♪ Come, come, my baby We can get love on ♪
translation.zh: ‎来嘛 宝贝 我们好好爱下去

translation.en: -♪ Ja ja ding dong ♪ -♪ Ding dong! ♪
♪ When I see you I feel a ding ding dong ♪
translation.zh: ‎我看到你时 感觉内心叮咚叮咚作响

translation.en: Okay, how about the Eurovision song now?
translation.zh:
‎好了  要不要听首
‎欧洲歌唱大赛的歌？
